task.title: Logging in to a UDDI registry

taskbody.prereq:
Prerequisites:
Register with a registry
Launch the Web Services Explorer

context.p: To Log in to the registry:

step.cmd: In the UDDI Navigator pane, select the registry.
In the Actions pane, select the Login icon in the toolbar.

In the Actions pane, enter the publish URL and your user ID and password in the Publish URL, User ID and Password fields respectively. The Publish URL field is the URL of the registry to which you are publishing your business entity or business service. Click Go.

result.p: When you have successfully logged in, the Status pane displays a message indicating you were successful.
